column5: Where is it GCD I looked and didn't see it, But I'm not real observant.

Me thinks that wen u ad a repli, thar iz a eye con with a chek-mark and ABC at the top of the repli box. I clik it and it sez ieSpell not detectid - clik OK for download site.  eye must bee missin it two.

Not only spell check is back but it is much faster on the load. All of us IE user now can make a reply and use the back button without getting the error message.  Thanks OFC for the new board functions and the bandwidth we use.  Art
Where is the spell check "ABC" ?  Special Item, A, aA won't work for me either. But then maybe my computer just doesn't like me anymore
